13  class KSIntCalculatorArgonSet :
14  public KSIntCalculatorSet
15  {
16  public:
17  KSIntCalculatorArgonSet();
18  virtual ~KSIntCalculatorArgonSet();
19 
20  public:
21  void AddCalculator( KSIntCalculator* aCalculator );
22  void ReleaseCalculators( KSIntScattering* aScattering );
23 
24  private:
25  K_SET_GET(string, Name)
26  K_SET_GET(bool, SingleIonisation)
27  K_SET_GET(bool, DoubleIonisation)
28  K_SET_GET(bool, Excitation)
29  K_SET_GET(bool, Elastic)
30  std::vector<KSIntCalculator*> fCalculators;
31  };

33 
34  typedef KComplexElement< KSIntCalculatorArgonSet > KSIntCalculatorArgonSetBuilder;
35 
36  template< >
37  inline bool KSIntCalculatorArgonSetBuilder::AddAttribute( KContainer* aContainer )
38  {
39  if( aContainer->GetName() == "name" )
40  {
41  aContainer->CopyTo( fObject, &KSIntCalculatorArgonSet::SetName );
42  return true;
43  }
44  else if( aContainer->GetName() == "elastic" )
45  {
46  aContainer->CopyTo( fObject, &KSIntCalculatorArgonSet::SetElastic );
47  return true;
48  }
49  else if( aContainer->GetName() == "excitation" )
50  {
51  aContainer->CopyTo( fObject, &KSIntCalculatorArgonSet::SetExcitation );
52  return true;
53  }
54  else if( aContainer->GetName() == "single_ionisation" )
55  {
56  aContainer->CopyTo( fObject, &KSIntCalculatorArgonSet::SetSingleIonisation );
57  return true;
58  }
59  else if( aContainer->GetName() == "double_ionisation" )
60  {
61  aContainer->CopyTo( fObject, &KSIntCalculatorArgonSet::SetDoubleIonisation );
62  return true;
63  }
64 
65  return false;
66  }
67 
68  template< >
69  inline bool KSIntCalculatorArgonSetBuilder::End()
70  {
71  if( fObject->GetElastic() )
72  {
73  KSIntCalculator* aIntCalculator;
74 
75  aIntCalculator = new KSIntCalculatorArgonElastic();
76  aIntCalculator->SetName( fObject->GetName() + "_elastic" );
77  aIntCalculator->SetTag( fObject->GetName() );
78  fObject->AddCalculator( aIntCalculator );
79  }
80 
81  if( fObject->GetSingleIonisation() )
82  {
83  KSIntCalculator* aIntCalculator;
84 
85  aIntCalculator = new KSIntCalculatorArgonSingleIonisation();
86  aIntCalculator->SetName( fObject->GetName() + "_single_ionisation" );
87  aIntCalculator->SetTag( fObject->GetName() );
88  fObject->AddCalculator( aIntCalculator );
89  }
90 
91  if( fObject->GetDoubleIonisation() )
92  {
93  KSIntCalculator* aIntCalculator;
94 
95  aIntCalculator = new KSIntCalculatorArgonDoubleIonisation();
96  aIntCalculator->SetName( fObject->GetName() + "_double_ionisation" );
97  aIntCalculator->SetTag( fObject->GetName() );
98  fObject->AddCalculator( aIntCalculator );
99  }
100 
101  if( fObject->GetExcitation() )
102  {
103  KSIntCalculator* aIntCalculator;
104 
105  for( unsigned int i = 0; i < 25; ++i )
106  {
107  std::stringstream tmp;
108  tmp << (i + 1);
109  aIntCalculator = new KSIntCalculatorArgonExcitation();
110  aIntCalculator->SetName( fObject->GetName() + "_excitation_state_" + tmp.str() );
111  aIntCalculator->SetTag( fObject->GetName() );
112  static_cast< KSIntCalculatorArgonExcitation* >( aIntCalculator )->SetExcitationState( i + 1 );
113  fObject->AddCalculator( aIntCalculator );
114  }
115  }
116  return true;
117  }
118 }
